description: Systematic verification of all API routes for consistency, code quality, and correctness

issues_found: TypeScript errors: Missing failedLoginCount and lockedUntil fields in User creation
TypeScript errors: result.data possibly undefined in verify-email and resend-verification handlers
Magic numbers: MAX_NAME_LENGTH (100), MAX_FAILED_ATTEMPTS (5), LOCKOUT_DURATION_MS (15min), token lengths (32), expiry times, PBKDF2 parameters
routes.notes: Verified 2026-01-30. Created src/constants/auth.ts with all auth constants. Fixed User type issues by adding missing fields. Fixed TypeScript errors with optional chaining. All magic numbers extracted to constants. Response format consistent. Security: email normalization, password hashing with PBKDF2, account lockout after failed attempts.

Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Response format consistent. Security: email normalization, constant-time password verification, account lockout after 5 failed attempts, generic error messages to prevent enumeration. All constants already extracted in Route #1 verification.

issues_found: Email from Google not normalized - could cause duplicate accounts with different casing
routes.notes: Verified 2026-01-30. Fixed: normalized Google email to lowercase. Security: Google token verified via Google's tokeninfo API, audience and issuer validation. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Security: token rotation (old token revoked, new tokens generated). Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: authMiddleware applied. Revokes single refresh token. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: authMiddleware applied. Revokes all user refresh tokens. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found (TypeScript error already fixed in Route #1). Validates email verification token. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found (TypeScript error already fixed in Route #1). Security: generic response to prevent email enumeration. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Validates API key and returns JWT. Service instantiation pattern consistent with other routes. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: authMiddleware. Creates tenant with owner. Response format consistent. HTTP 201 for creation.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: authMiddleware. Route order: correctly placed before /:id to avoid path conflict. Lists user's tenants.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: requireTenantMember (authorization). HTTP 404 for not found. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: requireTenantAdmin (authorization). Updates tenant. Response format consistent.
Verified 2026-01-30. No issues found. Middleware: requireTenantOwner (authorization). Deletes tenant. Response format consistent.

issues_found: TypeScript error: tenantId from c.req.param('id') could be undefined
routes.notes: Verified 2026-01-30. Fixed: added guard for undefined tenantId. Middleware: requireTenantMember. Lists tenant users. Response format consistent.

routes.notes: Verified 2026-01-30. Fixed: added guard for undefined tenantId. Middleware: requireTenantAdmin. Adds user to tenant. HTTP 201 for creation. Response format consistent.

routes.notes: Verified 2026-01-30. Fixed: added guards for undefined tenantId and userId. Middleware: requireTenantAdmin. Updates user role. Response format consistent.
